22.14 Summary
In this tutorial, you discovered the Activity Recognition Using Smartphones Dataset for time
series classiﬁcation and how to load and explore the dataset in order to make it ready for
predictive modeling. Speciﬁcally, you learned:
 How to download and load the dataset into memory.
